snippet: The Supreme Court temporarily blocked a federal court’s order that would have allowed same-sex marriages in Kansas to start on Tuesday.
abstract: Supreme Court temporarily blocks federal court’s order that would have allowed same-sex marriages in Kansas.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court temporarily blocked a federal court’s order that would have allowed same-sex marriages in Kansas to start on Tuesday.

headline.main: Supreme Court Stays Gay Marriage in Kansas
headline.print_headline: Court Stays Gay Marriage In Kansas

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
